projects.title: Hill Highway: Peerumade - Devikulam and Thodupuzha - Puliyanmala
projects.description: Improvements to Hill Highway from Peerumade to Devikulam (km 19/000 to 40/050) and Thodupuzha to Puliyanmala (km 85/500 to 92/167).
projects.impact: Enhances connectivity in the high ranges.

projects.title: Hill Highway: Kuttikkanam to Chappathu
projects.description: Improvements to Hill Highway between Ch: 0/000 to 19/000 from Kuttikkanam to Chappathu.

projects.title: Hill Highway: Iruttukanam - Anachal - Ellackal - Rajakkadu - Myladumpara
projects.description: Improvements to Hill Highway stretches including Stretch 1 (Ellackal - Valiya Mullakkanam Road, 5.03 km), Stretch 2 (Iruttukanam to Anachal), and Stretch 3 (Anachal to Ellackal Jn).
projects.impact: Better connectivity for tourism and locals.

projects.title: Hill Highway: Myladumpara - Puliyanmala Road
projects.description: Improvements to Myladumpara - Puliyanmala Road in Idukki District.

projects.title: Ramakkalmedu - Cumbummedu Vannapuram Road
